concept.title: 52.204-19 Incorporation by Reference of Representations and Certifications.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 4.1202(b), insert the following clause.
Incorporation by Reference of Representations and Certifications (Dec 2014)
The Contractorâ€™s representations and certifications, including those completed electronically via the System for Award Management (SAM), are incorporated by reference into the contract.
